TopicTitle: Lightly MODDED KSP Career Mode Let's Play

Articles.Content:
Hi,

First of all let me say how awesome this community is, from fan created mods to the stories being told on this forum, to the helpful people on my youtube channel giving me advice on my career mode playthrough, you are all awesome!

Secondly, dont let my name put you off - i'm not a real REDNECK! 

Anyhoo, i'm a English Let's Player, now living in Sweden trying to make a career out of Let's Playing, and have been playing KSP for a long time.

I currently have a Career Mode let's play over on my channel that i thought many of you might like to get involved in, giving advice, sharing ideas, and meeting my awesome (over 1000 subscribers).

I would love to hear from you over at my YOUTUBE channel - CLICK HERE!

OR

On my Let's Play KSP Playlist - KSP PLAYLIST

Keep flying my fellow Kerbanaut slavemasters!

 

Edited March 13, 2016 by RedneckEinstein
